channel.title: My Artist Side on Rayhaneh Einollahi
channel.description: Recent content in My Artist Side on Rayhaneh Einollahi

item.title: 'Artist Life' Digital Paintings
item.description: Once, when I had more time, I loved creating small gifts for the birthdays of those most precious to me.

item.title: 'Cloudy Dream' Short Animation 2021
item.description: Cloudy Dream is also an enviornmental film that points out to the serious problem of water scarcity.

item.title: 'Farewell' Digital Painting
item.description: Sometimes, when life feels heavy, kind souls do their best to lift us up—but even with their help, the struggle remains.

item.title: 'Green and Blue' Short Animation 2018
item.description: Our first animation, 'Green and Blue' (2018), is a 3D environmental short about air pollution.

item.title: 'Melina' Digital Painting
item.description: Same here, I love Attack on Titan!

item.title: 'Metropole' Digital Painting
item.description: Tragedies like this happen all too often. A building collapsed, and many firefighters lost their lives while protecting others. I couldn’t stop thinking about their bravery and sacrifice.

item.title: Architectural 3D Modeling
item.description: These 3D models were created from given architectural plans,trying to achieve the structure and form the architect had in mind.
